greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Correlation triangle for Thue-Morse sequence A010060(n+1).
comment: Row sums are A115383. T(2n,n) gives A115384(n+1).
formula: G.f.: A(x)A(x*y)/(1-x^2*y) where A(x) is the g.f. of A010060(n+1). Number triangle T(n, k)=sum{j=0..n, if(j<=k, A010060(k-j+1), 0)*if(j<=(n-k), A010060(n-k-j+1), 0)}.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jan 21 2006
